name: Arrowborn
description: Arrowborn is multiplayer Player versus Player VR Archery. Load your quiver with deadly magical arrows, ready your shield, then leap through the air as you loose barrages on your enemies from all angles. Play with up to 10 players or Bots over a variety of exciting game modes to prove you are Arrowborn!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5 4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
